title: Sirloin steak with golden onion rings
ingredients: ['100g (3 1/2 oz) plain flour, plus extra for dusting', '2 egg yolks', '150ml (5 oz) full fat milk', '100ml (3 1/2 oz) vegetable oil', '1 egg white', '2 large onions, cut into 1cm rings', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 (200g) sirloin steaks', '4 flat mushrooms', '2 beef tomatoes, halved']
